src.prompt

Class ConsolePrompt

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.prompt.ConsolePrompt

  • public class ConsolePrompt
extends java.lang.Object
    ConsolePrompt class manages all prompts and inputs from user and calls necessary methods to carry out the expected functionality

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String[] DaysofWeek 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConsolePrompt() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accountLogin()
      Prompts the user to input account name and password.
      void accountSignUp()
      Prompts the user to input required details for account creation and calls necessary methods to create the account.
      void consoleEventMenu()
      Allows the user to view upcoming events, all events, create an event or return to Main Menu.
      void consoleMainMenu()
      Main menu after a user has logged in/signed up successfully.
      void consoleOthersMenu()
      Prompts the user to use other functionality such as: Timer, Viewing Calender, Setting Alarm or returning to Main Menu
      void consoleProfileMenu()
      Displays information about the user account and allows them to change name, password or timezone.
      void setUserAccount(Account account)
      Set the account of the logged in user as the instance variable
      void start()
      Prompts the user to either login, signup or exit the program

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • DaysofWeek

        public static final java.lang.String[] DaysofWeek

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConsolePrompt

        public ConsolePrompt()

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Prompts the user to either login, signup or exit the program

      • accountLogin

        public void accountLogin()
        Prompts the user to input account name and password. If the username and password is valid, it loads the account details in an Account instance, otherwise, it prompts the user to try again or return to start menu.

      • consoleMainMenu

        public void consoleMainMenu()
        Main menu after a user has logged in/signed up successfully. Prompts the user to view their events, profile, other functionality or logout and redirects them to respective menu after the user has provided a valid input

      • consoleProfileMenu

        public void consoleProfileMenu()
        Displays information about the user account and allows them to change name, password or timezone.

      • consoleOthersMenu

        public void consoleOthersMenu()
        Prompts the user to use other functionality such as: Timer, Viewing Calender, Setting Alarm or returning to Main Menu

      • consoleEventMenu

        public void consoleEventMenu()
        Allows the user to view upcoming events, all events, create an event or return to Main Menu.

      • accountSignUp

        public void accountSignUp()
        Prompts the user to input required details for account creation and calls necessary methods to create the account.

      • setUserAccount

        public void setUserAccount(Account account)
        Set the account of the logged in user as the instance variable
        Parameters:
        account - the account of the logged in user
